version_description:
* Added capability to select backup destination folder
* UI and performace improved
* Minor bugs fixed

* Automatic backup is removed, due to the app is not appropriate to use background location update. We are now working on new solution, hope to bring back the feature in the near future.
* Added iCloud Photo Library support
* Added skip existing backup option
* Added backup video option
* Performance improved
* Minor bugs fixed

* Added Free Up Space feature. After backup, delete old photos by the time given, for example: photos that were taken one year ago.
* Added Automatic Backup feature. If turned on, the app will start backup whenever it detects a significant change in your iPhone's location.
* Minor bugs fixed

* We welcome your suggestion/feedback, please send it via our support email. Thank you for your support!
* Added multilingual support for backup folder name
* Added option for sub-folders creation.
* Menu re-arranged and improved.
* Performance improved.
* Minor bugs fixed.

* Added: backup will not be stopped if exporting photos failed. The failed photos will be shown in Log, and can be retried.
* Log added the capability to retry backup for failed photos.
* Added FAQ in menu.

* This demo app will pause every 30 photos. In-app purchase can unlock full version.
* Minor bugs fixed
* fixed a bug that log detail is not shown.

* Both video and image are now extracted from Live Photo. It can be turned off via Options.
* User interface improved, including Free Up Space and Reset Backup.
* Minor bugs fixed.

* Fixed compatibility with iOS 9 .
* Minor UI improved and bugs fixed.

* Improved In-app purchase functionality.
* Minor bugs fixed.

* Added landscape and iPad split screen support.
* UI improved.
* Bugs fixed.
* Minor bugs fixed and user interface improved.

* The app will now try to continue backup for a few minutes when it goes to background.
* Minor bugs fixed and performance improved.

* Fixed a bug that EXIF metadata might be lost.
* Minor bugs fixed and performance improved.
* Minor bugs fixed and performance improved.

* Fixed iOS 13 compatibility issues.
* To resolve file name issue in your earlier backup, please reset backup via Menu > Options > Reset Backup.
